name: Destructive Flyer
description:
Fly around destroying enemies and protect the blue slime creature!

Instructions

Point with the cursor and hold left click to fly around the map. Bump into enemies to hurt them and push them away, keeping them from the center of the map where the slime creature resides. The slime creature in the center must be protected.

To buy turrets, you'll need coins - Get these by killing enemies. When you have enough, drag a turret from the selection HUD over to where you want to place it, then release the left click button.

You win once all enemies are defeated on the final wave, and lose if the slime creature's HP runs out. Score is gained by collecting coins and keeping the creature's health high.

Technical Information / Etc

Programming: Written in Java with the LibGDX framework. Made for Ludum Dare 46 Compo.

Music/Sfx: Made up on a music keyboard then manually converted into beepbox.co for samples & layering

Artwork: Slapped together in Gimp
